items.longDescription:
- Crisp, glossy outer fabric pairs well with any style.
- Lined with jersey fabric for a smooth, comfortable feel.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Long-lasting freshness and comfort.
- Regular fit with sleek shoulders and a perfectly cinched cut from the waist to the hem.
- Suitable for active or everyday wear.
- Shirring detail on the cuff helps block cold air out.
- Brimmed hood keeps rain off your face and ensures good visibility.
- Versatile design can be styled up or down.

items.shortDescription: Crisp fabric with a soft, comfortable lining. Highly functional parka for everyday wear.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Machine-washable.
- Cotton and polyester yarns are knitted alternately to achieve good elasticity and stretch.
- Machine-washable and shape-retaining for easy care.
- Voluminous cut with a sleek design at the arms.
- Ribbed cuffs join naturally to the body.
- Ribbed collar seam positioned to minimize skin irritation.
- Stretch yarns help the garment keep its shape after washing, without sacrificing the distinctive knit look.
- The elegant texture of knitwear meets the comfort of a sweatshirt.
- This versatile piece pairs well with a T-shirt or with a shirt for the office.
items.name: Washable Milano Ribbed Long Sleeve Sweater
items.shortDescription: An elegant looking, easy-to-wear sweater. Versatile design for business or casual wear.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle

items.freeInformation:
■Inseam alteration is available for this product
- Depending on the length of the alteration, a seam may remain after the thread is unwound. Also, products with a distressed finish will not have distressed hems after inseam alteration. Your understanding is appreciated.
- Please refer to "Alteration Finishes" for alteration specifications.
- The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Cotton-linen blend that combines the best aspects of both.
- The weave was changed from flat to twill for a more casual style that is easy to coordinate.
- The regular tapered silhouette has just the right amount of ease.
- Gathered elastic waist provides comfort.
- The drawstring cord made from the same fabric looks great either inside or outside.
- Works in a wide range of styles from casual to dressy.
items.name: Linen Blend Relaxed Trousers
items.shortDescription: Breezy linen blend. Just the right amount of ease for a comfortable fit. Items bought with alternation service are not applicable for exchange or return.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, Dry Clean

The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Polyurethane coating for a waxed look.
- Lightweight flannel lining provides excellent heat retention.
- Ergonomic sleeves for easy movement.
- Ventilation under the arms.
- Convenient multi-pocket design.
- Concealed zip pocket on the front storm flap.
- Perfect for casual styling.

items.longDescription:
- Updated with a darker zipper and contrast woven fabric detail at the chest pocket.
- Now with a more roomy fit at the shoulders and sleeves and a more rounded silhouette toward the hem.
- Blocks cold air out to keep you warm.
- Warm fleece outerwear.
- With windproof technology.
- Windproof film with resin adhesive.
- Light, soft and puffy windproof fabric.
- Extra trim sewn into the front zipper to prevent catching on the outer fabric.
- Binder tape at the cuffs blocks out cold air and makes it easy to roll up the sleeves.
- Outer collar made of woven fabric to help it stand up.
- Zipper pull is easy to grip, even with gloves on.
- Suitable for outdoor or casual wear.

- The hood easily stores in The collar to expand styling and wearing scenarios.

- a warm outer layer that replaces down.
- warm, lightweight and Relaxed fit, great for outdoor activities or working long hours outdoors.
